title: Arrow
data:
***Obsolete**: This article refers to an aspect of the game which has been removed. It is retained for historical reference only.*

| Name        | Arrow                                                            |
| :---------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Launcher    | [Shortbow](/Shortbow "Shortbow") / [Longbow](/Longbow "Longbow") |
| Base damage | Uses launcher damage value                                       |

|   |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
| - | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | A long shafted projectile intended to be shot with a shortbow or longbow, fletched with feathers at one end and a point at the other.***"I saw in a hall an arrow pointing the way and I thought that this inoffensive symbol had once been a thing of iron, an inescapable and fatal projectile that pierced the flesh of men and lions and clouded the sun at Thermopylae and gave Harald Sigurdarson six feet of English earth forever."-Jorge Luis Borges, \_Mutations\_. 1960.trans. Mildred Boyle |

**Arrows** are a form of [ammunition](/Ammunition "Ammunition") shot with [shortbows](/Shortbow "Shortbow") or [longbows](/Longbow "Longbow"), governed by the [Bows](/Bows "Bows") skill. Unless you worship [Okawaru](/Okawaru "Okawaru"), your ammunition supply is limited by what you find on the ground and take from enemy archers. [Centaurs](/Centaur_\(monster\) "Centaur (monster)"), [fauns](/Faun "Faun"), [naga sharpshooters](/Naga_sharpshooter "Naga sharpshooter"), and [deep elf archers](/Deep_elf_archer "Deep elf archer") all leave stacks of arrows after you defeat them.

|                                                            |
| ---------------------------------------------------------- |
| Arrow                                                      |
| [![Arrow1.png](/images/d/db/Arrow1.png)](/File:Arrow1.png) |

## History

- Arrows were removed with all launcher ammo in [0.29](/0.29 "0.29").
- Prior to [0.18](/0.18 "0.18"), arrows could generate with a variety of [brands](/Brand "Brand").

| [Weapons](/Weapon "Weapon")                          |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
| ---------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [Axes](/Axes "Axes")                                 | [Battleaxe](/Battleaxe "Battleaxe") • [Broad axe](/Broad_axe "Broad axe") • [Executioner's axe](/Executioner%27s_axe "Executioner's axe") • [Hand axe](/Hand_axe "Hand axe") • [War axe](/War_axe "War axe")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |
| [Maces & Flails](/Maces_%26_Flails "Maces & Flails") | [Club](/Club "Club") • [Demon whip](/Demon_whip "Demon whip") • [Dire flail](/Dire_flail "Dire flail") • [Eveningstar](/Eveningstar "Eveningstar") • [Flail](/Flail "Flail") • [Giant club](/Giant_club "Giant club") • [Giant spiked club](/Giant_spiked_club "Giant spiked club") • [Great mace](/Great_mace "Great mace") • [Mace](/Mace "Mace") ([Hammer](/Hammer "Hammer")) • [Morningstar](/Morningstar "Morningstar") • [Sacred scourge](/Sacred_scourge "Sacred scourge") • [Whip](/Whip "Whip") |
| [Long Blades](/Long_Blades "Long Blades")            | [Demon blade](/Demon_blade "Demon blade") • [Double sword](/Double_sword "Double sword") • [Eudemon blade](/Eudemon_blade "Eudemon blade") • [Falchion](/Falchion "Falchion") • [Great sword](/Great_sword "Great sword") • [Long sword](/Long_sword "Long sword") • [Scimitar](/Scimitar "Scimitar") • [Triple sword](/Triple_sword "Triple sword")                                                                                                                                                     |
| [Polearms](/Polearms "Polearms")                     | [Bardiche](/Bardiche "Bardiche") • [Demon trident](/Demon_trident "Demon trident") • [Glaive](/Glaive "Glaive") • [Halberd](/Halberd "Halberd") ([Scythe](/Scythe "Scythe")) • [Spear](/Spear "Spear") • [Trident](/Trident "Trident") • [Trishula](/Trishula "Trishula")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
| [Ranged Weapons](/Ranged_Weapons "Ranged Weapons")   | [Arbalest](/Arbalest "Arbalest") • [Hand cannon](/Hand_cannon "Hand cannon") • [Longbow](/Longbow "Longbow") • [Orcbow](/Orcbow "Orcbow") • [Shortbow](/Shortbow "Shortbow") • [Sling](/Sling "Sling") • [Triple crossbow](/Triple_crossbow "Triple crossbow")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
| [Short Blades](/Short_Blades "Short Blades")         | [Dagger](/Dagger "Dagger") • [Quick blade](/Quick_blade "Quick blade") • [Rapier](/Rapier "Rapier") • [Short sword](/Short_sword "Short sword")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
| [Staves](/Staves "Staves")                           | [Lajatang](/Lajatang "Lajatang") • [Magical staff](/Magical_staff "Magical staff") • [Quarterstaff](/Quarterstaff "Quarterstaff")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
| [Throwing](/Throwing "Throwing")                     | [Boomerang](/Boomerang "Boomerang") • [Dart](/Dart "Dart") • [Javelin](/Javelin "Javelin") • [Large rock](/Large_rock "Large rock") • [Stone](/Stone "Stone") • [Throwing net](/Throwing_net "Throwing net")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |
html:
Arrow

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Obsolete: This article refers to an aspect of the game which has been removed. It is retained for historical reference only.
Name Arrow
Launcher Shortbow / Longbow
Base damage Uses launcher damage value
A long shafted projectile intended to be shot with a shortbow or longbow, fletched with feathers at one end and a point at the other.

"I saw in a hall an arrow pointing the way and I thought that this inoffensive symbol had once been a thing of iron, an inescapable and fatal projectile that pierced the flesh of men and lions and clouded the sun at Thermopylae and gave Harald Sigurdarson six feet of English earth forever."

-Jorge Luis Borges, _Mutations_. 1960.

trans. Mildred Boyle

Arrows are a form of ammunition shot with shortbows or longbows, governed by the Bows skill. Unless you worship Okawaru, your ammunition supply is limited by what you find on the ground and take from enemy archers. Centaurs, fauns, naga sharpshooters, and deep elf archers all leave stacks of arrows after you defeat them.

Arrow

History

  • Arrows were removed with all launcher ammo in 0.29.
  • Prior to 0.18, arrows could generate with a variety of brands.
Weapons
Axes Battleaxe • Broad axe • Executioner's axe • Hand axe • War axe
Maces & Flails Club • Demon whip • Dire flail • Eveningstar • Flail • Giant club • Giant spiked club • Great mace • Mace (Hammer) • Morningstar • Sacred scourge • Whip
Long Blades Demon blade • Double sword • Eudemon blade • Falchion • Great sword • Long sword • Scimitar • Triple sword
Polearms Bardiche • Demon trident • Glaive • Halberd (Scythe) • Spear • Trident • Trishula
Ranged Weapons Arbalest • Hand cannon • Longbow • Orcbow • Shortbow • Sling • Triple crossbow
Short Blades Dagger • Quick blade • Rapier • Short sword
Staves Lajatang • Magical staff • Quarterstaff
Throwing Boomerang • Dart • Javelin • Large rock • Stone • Throwing net

'''Arrows''' are a form of [[ammunition]] shot with [[shortbow]]s or [[longbow]]s, governed by the [[Bows]] skill. Unless you worship [[Okawaru]], your ammunition supply is limited by what you find on the ground and take from enemy archers. [[Centaur (monster)|Centaurs]], [[faun]]s, [[naga sharpshooter]]s, and [[deep elf archer]]s all leave stacks of arrows after you defeat them.
